ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] money
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Basically farming and doing lost dungeon adventures is pretty profitable. I myself am not good at making money yet. I need to work on it. I m hoping to be
ygData.messageBody:
> hello everyone.. I am new to this club but not EQ.. Lets talk about
> makeing money.. I know to kill giants and farm silks and hides to
> make money and you make god money doing this.. But how the heck do
> people make 100k and more lol.. most i have had at one time is 5k..
> If there is a better way to make pp please let me know thanks
>
Basically farming and doing lost dungeon adventures is pretty profitable. I
myself am not good at making money yet. I need to work on it. I'm hoping to
be able to profit from my jewelcraft when I get it high enough. I had to get
it high to work on my 7th shawl. If you have a foraging class, you can make
coin foraging stuff to sell.
Anyone know of good websites that have money making advice (not the pay
sites)?
luv,
-Su
